briefTitle: A Comparison of Symbicort速 Single Inhaler Therapy and Conventional Best Practice for the Treatment of Persistent Asthma
officialTitle: A Comparison of Symbicort速 Single Inhaler Therapy (Symbicort Turbuhaler速 160/4.5mg, 1 Inhalation Two Times a Day (b.i.d.) Plus as Needed) and Conventional Best Practice for the Treatment of Persistent Asthma in Adults a -26-week, Randomized, Open-label, Parallel-group, Multicentre Study
summary: The primary objective is to compare the efficacy of Symbicort Single inhaler Therapy with treatment according to conventional best practice in adult patients with persistent asthma.

primaryOutcome.measure: Time to First Severe Asthma Exacerbation
